mapper.insert: insert into homeworktb(homeworkTitle, startDate, endDate, homeworkDetail, memberIdx) values(#{homeworkTitle}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{homeworkDetail}, #{memberIdx})
mapper.select: select count(*) from homeworktb where memberIdx in (select idx from membertb where grade=#{grade} and classnum=#{classnum})
select count(*) from homeworktb where memberIdx = #{memberIdx}
select * from homeworktb where memberIdx in (select idx from membertb where grade=#{grade} and classnum=#{classnum})
select idx as homeworkIdx, homeworkTitle, startDate, endDate,homeworkDetail, memberIdx from homeworktb where memberIdx = #{memberIdx}
